column1: Jim and I went to dinner a few times when he got back from New York. I talked him through his break up. Its really nice to be good friends again.

Oscar, Toby, and I are founding members of the Finer Things Club.  We meet once a month to discuss books and art, celebrate culture in a very civilized way.  Sometimes the debate can get heated, but were always respectful.  There is no paper, no plastic, and no work talk allowed.  Its very exclusive.
